Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription:
This is a third and fourth year elective module for all YSTCM students. This module seeks to develop the studentsâ€™ technical and artistic capacity for performance
and communication in a variety of formal and non-formal contexts. The students will engage in performances in a community setting, ranging from a local Singaporean one to a larger one that includes the South East Asian region.
